title: breach response
extract: A data breach response plan is a course of action intended to reduce the risk of unauthorized data access and to mitigate the damage caused if a breach does occur. ... Test your response plan frequently and address any weak areas as soon as they are discovered.
extract_html: A data breach response plan is a course of action intended to reduce the risk of unauthorized data access and to mitigate the damage caused if a breach does occur. ... Test your response plan frequently and address any weak areas as soon as they are discovered.
